metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1592 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Movable Type Pro, Open Source, and Advanced before 5.2.12 and Pro and Advanced 6.0.x before 6.0.7 does not properly use the Perl Storable::thaw function, which allows remote attackers to include and execute arbitrary local Perl files and possibly execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: movabletype-opensource: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
